name: CreateCaseTypeInDatadog
description:
Initiate the creation of a new case type in Datadog.

Use this tool to create a new case type in Datadog, enabling structured classification and management of cases within the platform.

parameters.name: case_type_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the case type to be created in Datadog.

parameters.name: case_type_resource_type
parameters.description: Specify the resource type for the case. Must be 'case_type'.

parameters.name: case_type_deleted_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp indicating when the case type was deleted. Format should be a valid ISO 8601 string.

value_schema.description: Timestamp of when the case type was deleted

parameters.name: case_type_description
parameters.description: A brief textual description of the case type to be created in Datadog.

parameters.name: case_type_emoji
parameters.description: Emoji representing the case type. Use a short, descriptive Unicode emoji.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.deleted_at
parameters.description: Timestamp of when the case type was deleted

value_schema.description: Timestamp of when the case type was deleted
